mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (cno, pno, content, writer, password) VALUES (seq_comment.nextval, #{pno}, #{comment}, #{writer}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT cno, pno, content as "comment", writer, com.regDate, com.updatedate, mem.nickname as writerNickname FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_ASC(tbl_comment pk_comment) */ rownum as rn, cno, pno, content, writer, regDate, updatedate FROM tbl_comment WHERE pno = #{pno} ) com LEFT JOIN tbl_member mem ON com.writer = mem.email ORDER BY com.rn
